complexType.UnitAndValue<T>.description: A numeric value tagged with its unit

complexType.UnitAndValues<T>.description: A value set tagged with its unit

connectivity.eligibility.MeetingSlot.description: Represents a time slot for a meeting

slotId.description: Represent a meeting id for a fiber collect operator

uiCode.description: An opaque string that represents an intervention unit

connectivity.eligibility.Meetings.description: List of available meeting time slots

canBookFakeMeeting.description: Whether or not it is possible to book a fake meeting

order.OrderDetailTypeEnum.description: Product type of item in order

order.Price.description: Price with it's currency and textual representation

service.RenewType.description: Map a possible renew for a specific service

deleteAtExpiration.description: The service will be deleted at expiration

forced.description: The service forced to be renewed

manualPayment.description: The service needs to be manually renewed and paid

service.RenewalTypeEnum.description: Detailed renewal type of a service

canDeleteAtExpiration.description: Indicates that the service can be set up to be deleted at expiration

possibleRenewPeriod.description: All the possible renew period of your service in month

creationDatetime.description: Creation datetime of the return merchandise authorisation ticket

newMerchandise.description: New merchandise brand in case of exchange

offerTypeNew.description: Offer type of the new merchandise in case of exchange

offerTypeOld.description: Offer type of the return merchandise

receptionDatetime.description: Reception datetime of the return merchandise authorisation ticket

shippingContact.description: Contact information related to the delivery shipping in case of exchange

steps.description: Indicates the current status of the RMA with a list of steps

terminationDatetime.description: Termination datetime of the return merchandise authorisation ticket

telephony.RmaChangeTypeEnum.description: Types of return merchandise authorisation you can change to

telephony.RmaStep.description: Informations related to the current RMA step status

description.description: A brief description of the step

doneDate.description: The date when this step was done

name.description: The name of the RMA step

enum: resends due to shipping lost by the carrier
resends due to shipping not withdraw

lnsRateLimit.description: Rate limit on the LNS in kbps - Only available if canApplyLnsRateLimit capability is set to true - Must be a multiple of 64 - Min value 64 / Max value 100032

monitoring.description: Whether or not this access is monitored

packName.description: Pack name, if access is in a pack

xdsl.AccessCapabilities.description: Describe the capabilities of the Access

incident.description: Is there an ongoing genericIncident on the access ?

isActiveOnLns.description: Is the access active on its primary or secondary LNS

maintenance.description: Is there an ongoing scheduled maintenance by operator on the access ?

remaining.description: Remaining number of diagnostic for this access

xdsl.AccessDiagnosticCapabilities.description: Describe the capabilities of the access diagnostic

xdsl.AccessStatisticsTypeEnum.description: Various types of statisctics available for the access.

defaultGateway.description: The default gateway to be given to the clients

domainName.description: Domain name provided to the clients

endAddress.description: Last address of the pool assigned by the DHCP

leaseTime.description: Lease time in seconds of client assigned address (-1 means infinite)

primaryDNS.description: Primary DNS servers to be given to the clients

secondaryDNS.description: Secondary DNS servers to be given to the clients

serverEnabled.description: State of the DHCP server of the modem

startAddress.description: First address of the pool assigned by the DHCP

subnetMask.description: The subnet mask given to the clients

taskId.description: ID of the ongoing todo (NULL if none)

IPAddress.description: The IP address of the device

MACAddress.description: The MAC address of the device

name.description: Name of the DHCP Static lease

taskId.description: ID of the ongoing todo (NULL if none)

engagement.description: Duration of month the access will be engaged

monthlyPrice.description: New abo price after the deconsolidation

xdsl.DeviceModemInfo.description: Describe device informations of a Modem

xdsl.DslamPort.description: Information about the port on the DSLAM

lastDesyncDate.description: Last time the port lost the synchronization

xdsl.DslamPortLog.description: A message log from the DSLAM

lastOccurrenceDate.description: The last time this message occured

numberOfOccurrences.description: The number of times this message occured between date and lastOccurrenceDate

xdsl.DslamPortStatusEnum.description: Different states of a DSLAM port

xdsl.ExtraIpRangeMove.description: Informations about the extra IP range during address move

moveTo.description: Access where the IP range will be moved to

xdsl.FaultRepairTimeEnum.description: Maximum time needed to repair a landline

IPAddress.description: The IP address of the LAN interface of the modem

addressingType.description: How the LAN interface of the modem is gettig its address

subnetMask.description: The subnet mask of the LAN interface of the modem

taskId.description: ID of the ongoing todo (NULL if none)

xdsl.LandlineConcentrationPoint.description: Infos about a Landline at the concentration point

lineHead.description: Identifier of the head of the cable from the MDF

lineInitialSection.description: Identifier of the section at the lineHead

lineInitialSectionPair.description: Identifier of the pair at the lineHead's lineInitialSection

xdsl.Line.description: Information about the physical copper line

concentrationPoint.description: Data to identify the line at the concentration point

directDistribution.description: True if the line is directly wired on the DSLAM

distance.description: Distance in meters from the DSLAM

lineSectionsLength.description: Detailed information about the sections between the DSLAM and the telephone jack

mitigation.description: Mitigation of the line in dB

originalNumber.description: The number used to place the order. Null if the same as the current number.

portability.description: Whether the line number has been ported to OVH, to be used with VoIP service

syncDown.description: The download synchronisation on the DSLAM in Kbps

syncUp.description: The upload synchronisation on the DSLAM in Kbps

diameter.description: The diameter of this section in millimeters

length.description: The length of this section in meters

xdsl.LineStatisticsTypeEnum.description: Various types of statisctics available for the line.

acsBackend.description: ACS backend used by the modem

dmzIP.description: IP Address of the DMZ (To modify or delete the DMZ IP on the modem, a re-configuration of your modem has to be made, your configuration will be maintained, but you will lose your connection a few minutes)

easyFirewallLevel.description: Level of the FireWall on the modem

ipv6Support.description: Whether or not the modem supports IPv6

isBridged.description: Whether or not the modem is in bridge mode. To pass from bridge mode to routed mode, a reset is necessary. If the modem is managedByOvh, the bridge state will be kept after a reset

lastCwmpRequestDate.description: Last time the modem made a CWMP request to the Auto Configuration Server

managedByOvh.description: Whether or not the user can configure his modem via OVH Interface (will lock telnet and local HTTP configuration page)

mtuSize.description: Size of the Maximum Transmission Unit on the modem's interfaces

xdsl.ModemCapabilities.description: Describe the capabilities of the Modem

canExchange.description: To know if you can exchange your modem

price.description: Price without tax to pay for exchange

priceWithTax.description: Price with tax included to pay for exchange

xdsl.ModemInfo.description: Describe general information of a Modem

xdsl.MonitoringNotification.description: Defines where and how the notifications will be sent

allowIncident.description: Whether or not to allow notifications for generic incidents

downThreshold.description: The number of seconds the access has to be down to trigger an alert

email.description: The e-mail address, if type is mail

frequency.description: The frenquency to send reminders when the access is still down

phone.description: The phone number, if type is sms

smsAccount.description: The SMS account which will be debited for each sent SMS, if the type is sms

xdsl.PendingAction.description: Scheduled action before the next renewal of the service

allowedRemoteIp.description: An ip which will access to the defined rule. Default : no restriction applied

externalPortEnd.description: The last port of the interval on the External Client that will get the connections

externalPortStart.description: External Port that the modem will listen on. List of externalPorts not available for now in the API : 8, 21, 68, 5060, 21800-21805, 51005

id.description: ID of the port mapping entry

internalClient.description: The IP address of the destination of the packets

internalPort.description: The port on the Internal Client that will get the connections

internalPortEnd.description: The last port of the interval on the Internal Client that will get the connections

name.description: Name of the port mapping entry

protocol.description: Protocol of the port mapping (TCP / UDP)

taskId.description: ID of the ongoing todo (NULL if none)

xdsl.RadiusConnectionLog.description: Log entry of an auth attempt to the radius server

dateTodo.description: Date when the resiliation will take effect

needModemReturn.description: If the customer needs to return his modem

registrationDate.description: Date when the resiliation was done

xdsl.ResiliationSurvey.description: Information about the reason for the resiliation

type.description: Type of reason for the resiliation

engageDate.description: Date until which the customer is engaged

resiliationDate.description: Date at which the access will be resiliated

xdsl.StatsModemInfo.description: Describe statistics information of a Modem

quarterHourStart.description: Count from last refresh in seconds

xdsl.Task.description: Describes the current status of a task

todoDate.description: Date when the action will start

DHCP.description: List of DHCP for this template

LAN.description: List of LAN for this template

WLAN.description: List of WLAN for this template

capabilities.description: Parameters capabilities. Lists what can be applied from this template

mtuSize.description: Size of the Maximum Transmission Unit on the modem's interfaces

parametersToIgnore.description: Do not apply these parameters from template. You can use parametersCapabilities to know availability

portMapping.description: List of PortMapping for this template

xdsl.TimestampAndValue.description: A value associated to a timestamp

SSID.description: Service Set Identifier of the WLAN interface

bandSteering.description: Indicate if frequencies 2.4GHz and 5GHz are agregated

channel.description: Choice of a channel (When chosen, channelMode is set to Manual)

channelMode.description: How the channel is chosen (Auto / Manual)

guest.description: Indicate if it is normal access wifi or guest wifi

taskId.description: ID of the ongoing todo (NULL if none)

result.description: Table with evidences stored on PCS

xdsl.antiSpam.EvidencesInfoDetail.description: detail on evidences stored on PCS

active.description: The state of this device on the modem

addressSource.description: How did the device got its IP address

hostName.description: Host name given by the device to the modem

informationDate.description: The date time of the last update of thoses informations

interfaceType.description: On which interface is connected the device

ipAddress.description: The IP address of the device

leaseTimeRemaining.description: The remaining time in seconds of the DHCP lease of this device (-1 means infinite)

xdsl.email.pro.TaskStatusEnum.description: Status of an Email Pro task.

bandwidthTestUnit.description: bandwidth unit for proof.ovh.net test values

comment.description: comment will contains all informations needed for intervention and about your access problem

conditionsAccepted.description: customer knows that he can be charged (150 euros HT) if he is responsible for the problem or if tests have not been done correctly ?

downloadBandwidthTest.description: bandwidth download value on proof.ovh.net test

endAfternoonHours.description: afternoon closing informations or time for the site

endMorningHours.description: morning closing informations or time for the site

followBySms.description: indicate if customer wants to be informed by sms

hasModemKeptSynchronization.description: Has modem kept his synchronization during line port reset ?

idAppointment.description: id of appointment chosen ("possibleValues" contains choices list with id)

modemStillSynchronized.description: Modem still synchronized ? Please check once again.

ovhTicket.description: Ovh ticket name or ticket ID, only if a ticket is already opened for this problem

severalInternetConnections.description: Has customer several internal connections ? (on the same place)

siteClosedDays.description: days or period where site access is not possible

startAfternoonHours.description: afternoon opening informations or time for the site

startMorningHours.description: morning opening informations or time for the site

uploadBandwidthTest.description: bandwidth upload value on proof.ovh.net test

xdsl.lineDiagnostic.BandwidthTestUnitEnu.description: bandwidth unit for proof.ovh.net test values

xdsl.lineDiagnostic.ConnectionInformatio.description: Informations directly get on DSLAM or Modem

data.description: Contains informations about diagnostic (questions, previous answers, actions to do, line details, selt result...)

actionsDone.description: List of actions already done by customer

actionsToDo.description: List of actions that must be done by customer

comment.description: Diagnostic comment. Can be update during any diagnostic step

diagnosticDoneDate.description: End of diagnostic date. Will be null until problem totally identified

timeout.description: Diagnostic timeout in minutes. Any action restart timeout

toAnswer.description: List of questions that must be answered by customer

connectionInfo.description: informations directly get on DSLAM or Modem

lineType.description: dsl connexion type for the line

distance.description: Distance of the problem identified on the line (by SELT test), from NRA to customer

state.description: Problem type identified by SELT test

domainName.description: Domain name provided to the clients

endAddress.description: Last address of the pool assigned by the DHCP

leaseTime.description: Lease time in seconds of client assigned address (-1 means infinite)

primaryDNS.description: Primary DNS servers to be given to the clients

secondaryDNS.description: Secondary DNS servers to be given to the clients

serverEnabled.description: State of the DHCP server of the modem

startAddress.description: First address of the pool assigned by the DHCP

subnetMask.description: The subnet mask given to the clients

addressingType.description: How the LAN interface of the modem is getting its address

subnetMask.description: The subnet mask of the LAN interface of the modem

guest.description: Indicate if it is normal access wifi or guest wifi
